"Angel of Flame": "Save the civilians surrounded by flames!"
"Save the civilians surrounded by flames!"
"炎のＡＮＧＥＬ"
"炎に囲まれた要救助者を救助せよ！"
"炎に囲まれた要救助者を救助せよ！"

"There are people throughout the residential
area who weren't able to escape! Save them
quickly!"

"/face2 Sensors have confirmed that all
civilians have been saved. Good job!"

"You've gotta get out of there! It's too late!
We'll teleport the rest of the civilians outta
there by force!"

"Sensors have confirmed the locations of
civilians at the indicated points. Save them
quickly!"

"In order for us to teleport them safely, we'll need
you to extinguish the flames and send us their
coordinates."

"Civilian coordinates confirmed.
Ready for teleportation!
Continue on to the next civilian."

"The civilian is surrounded by flames.
If you don't put them out, teleporting them
could be dangerous!"

"Our sensor are picking up readings of
additional civilians. Rescue them all!"

"Things are getting bad out there!
Hurry! The civilians don't have much time
left!"

"Civilian vitals are reading critical!
You must hurry!"

"Flames have been extinguished.
Please send us the coordinates for the
civilian."

"市街地のあちこちで、逃げ遅れた人が
救助を待っています！
至急救助に向かって下さい！"

"/face2 反応のあった全ての要救助者の
救助を確認しました。
お疲れ様でした！"

"これ以上は危険です！
リスクは高いですが、要救助者全員を
強制的に転送します！"

"要救助者の位置を確認しました。
マーカーに表示された
要救助者を助け出してください！"

"安全に転送するため
消火後、要救助者にアクセスして
正確な座標を送ってください。"

"要救助者の座標を特定。
転送確認完了です！
救助を続けて下さい！"

"要救助者が炎に囲まれています。
炎を消さないと、転送は危険です。
まずは消火してください。"

"新たな要救助者を確認しました。
全て救助してください！"

"要救助者、危険な状況です！
急いで救助に向かってください！"

"要救助者のバイタル、危険域です！
急いでください！"

"消火を確認。
要救助者にアクセスし、
正確な座標を送ってください。"

"Civilians are trapped all around
the residential area. Hurry, we need
you to save them!"

"We've confirmed successful teleportation
of all civilians. A job well done."

"There's no more time! You need to get out
of there! We're force-teleporting the rest
of the civilians!"

"Sensors have confirmed the locations of
civilians at the indicated points. Hurry and
save them!"

"We'll need the coordinates for each civilian
in order to teleport them safely, but first
you'll need to extinguish any flames."

"Civilian coordinates have been confirmed and
teleportation is complete. Keep up the good
work until all civilians have been saved."

"A civilian was found!
It's too big a risk to teleport them without putting
out the flames first! We're leaving that to you."

"New civilians are coming up on sensors.
Quick, find them all!"

"Seems we're almost out of time after all…
Hurry, try to save as many as you can."

"There's no time left! Staying any longer is
dangerous. Hurry!"

"Flames have been extinguished. We can now
teleport safely. Send us the coordinates for
the civilian."

"市街地で広域にわたって
要救助者が存在する。
急ぎ救助に向かえ。"

"全ての要救助者の転送を確認。
よくやった。"

"もう間に合わん。
リスクは相当に高いが
要救助者全員を強制転送する！"

"要救助者の位置を確認。
マーカーに表示する。
迅速に救助に向かえ。"

"安全に転送するには
正確な座標が必要となる。
消火後、要救助者に接触しろ。"

"要救助者の座標を確認、転送完了。
その調子で全て救助しろ。"

"要救助者発見。
炎を消さねば転送にもリスクが伴う。
まずは炎を消火し、救助しろ。"

"新たな要救助者を確認。
早急に救助へ向かえ。"

"流石に時間がかかりすぎたか……
可能な限り、急いで救助しろ。"

"これ以上は危険だ。
急げ！"

"消火確認。今なら安全に転送可能だ。
要救助者にアクセスし、
正確な座標を送れ。"

"There's still many civilians who weren't able
to escape from the residential area!
Hurry, you've got to save them!"

"/face2 We've gotten confirmation! All civilians
have been rescued! Way to go!"

"/face4 There's no more time! Even with the
risks involved, we're going to have to force-
teleport the rest of the civilians!"

"We've confirmed the locations of the
civilians still within the residential rea.

"We're gonna need the coordinates for the

"/face2 Coordinates confirmed! Teleportation
complete. Keep it up!"

"It's too big a risk to teleport them when

extinguish them!"

"Yikes! New civilians are coming up on

"Move, move, move!"

"/face4 We're almost at the breaking point!
Hurry before it's too late!"

"/face2 Flames have been extinguished!
Now please send us the civilian's
coordinates."
